message: Accept this offer and we can both go home happy!
Let's split it 50/50, a fair and reasonable offer!
You should have taken the 50/50 split when you had the chance!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but not much more!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie, but I'm keeping most of it!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in now. I'll take almost all of it and leave you with just a few crumbs.
This is my final offer, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
